newsitem.title: JAPAN: SS Pharmaceutical shares up in morning trade.
newsitem.headline: SS Pharmaceutical shares up in morning trade.

text.p: Shares in SS Pharmaceutical Co Ltd shares were higher in morning trade, lifted by investors hoping for fast profits, brokers said.
As of 0154 GMT the shares were 71 yen higher at 801 yen, the largest percentage gainer on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange.
Brokers said SS Pharmaceutical shares were traded actively by speculative investors last spring and were being sought after again by such investors.

"Trade in major issues are dull at the moment and speculative shares are attracting attention," a broker at a second-tier brokerage said. "The buying of SS Pharmaceutical shares is part of this trend."
